itineraries.title: DEUTSCHE ALPENSTRAßE: FROM THE SHORES OF BODENSEE TO KÖNIGSSEE (5 DAYS OF LAKES, PANORAMAS AND CASTLES)

visits.text: Lindau Insel – Old town and historic port on Bodensee (lighthouse, Mangturm)
Scheidegg – Baumwipfelpfad Skywalk Allgäu (treetop canopy walk)
Oberstaufen → Immenstadt → Sonthofen – Allgäu panoramic route
Bad Hindelang & Oberjochpass – viewpoints over the Allgäu Alps

activities.text: Photo stops along the Deutsche Alpenstraße (marked scenic areas)
Short walk to Aussichtspunkt Kanzel/Oberjoch

visits.text: Schloss Neuschwanstein – interior visit and path at the foot of the castle
Marienbrücke – viewpoint over Neuschwanstein (walking access from Hohenschwangau)
Schloss Hohenschwangau – exterior and gardens
Lechfall (Füssen) – waterfall on the Lech river

activities.text: Walk around Alpsee (Hohenschwangau) – lakeside path

visits.text: Partnachklamm (Garmisch-Partenkirchen) – developed gorge
Eibsee – partial loop along the lake shore with viewpoints of the Zugspitze

activities.text: Zugspitze – cable car ascent Seilbahn Zugspitze (weather permitting), panorama at the summit

visits.text: Prien/Stock am Chiemsee – boat crossing to Herreninsel
Schloss Herrenchiemsee – visit to the palace and gardens
Fraueninsel – tour of the island and Frauenwörth Benedictine abbey

activities.text: End-of-day walk along the shores of Chiemsee (Priener Uferweg)

visits.text: Königssee – cruise to St. Bartholomä and Obersee (seasonal)
Jennerbahn – ascent to Jenner and viewpoints of the Watzmann and Königssee

activities.text: Malerwinkel-Rundweg – panoramic trail above Königssee

itineraries.title: THE ROMANTIC ROAD OF GERMANY – FROM FRANKFURT TO FÜSSEN

visits.text: Walk along the Main river
Visit to Frankfurt's Saint Bartholomew Cathedral
Discovery of Römerberg square and the Fountain of Justice
Stroll through downtown parks and tasting of typical pretzels

activities.text: Discovery of a local beer festival with music and Bavarian atmosphere

visits.text: Stop at Johannisburg castle in Aschaffenburg
Discovery of the medieval village of Winterhausen
Walk in the fortified old town of Ochsenfurt

activities.text: Stroll through the alleyways and observation of the medieval towers and gates of Ochsenfurt

visits.text: Visit to Bad Mergentheim and the Deutschordens Museum
Stroll through the palace gardens of Bad Mergentheim
Exploration of Wildpark Bad Mergentheim wildlife park

activities.text: Discovery of the historic center of Rothenburg ob der Tauber and its medieval ramparts

visits.text: Walk on the rampart walkway
Discovery of Plönlein, the iconic view of Rothenburg
Visit to the town hall and market square
Exploration of Christmas shops and German craft products
Panorama from the viewpoint over the old town

activities.text: Free walk through the gardens and medieval streets

visits.text: Stop at Harburg castle dating from the 11th century
Exploration of Harburg old town and panorama over the Nördlingen crater

activities.text: Scenic route along the Romantische Strasse to Munich

visits.text: Discovery of Marienplatz square and the new town hall clock show
Visit to the Frauenkirche and the Fischbrunnen
Discovery of the Viktualienmarkt market
Visit to the Munich Residence palace

activities.text: Evening in a traditional brewery with Bavarian music

visits.text: Stop at BMW Welt, Munich's automotive exhibition center
Scenic route to Füssen along the Bavarian Alps

activities.text: Stroll through the historic center of Füssen and along the banks of the Lech
Discovery of the Lech Falls (Lechfall)

visits.text: Visit to Neuschwanstein Castle
View from the Marienbrücke bridge
Exterior discovery of Hohenschwangau Castle

activities.text: Hike to the panoramic viewpoint over the valley

visits.text: Walk at the Walderlebniszentrum Füssen and on the aerial walkway between Germany and Austria
Excursion in the neighboring Austrian Alps

activities.text: Free walk along the Forggensee and picnic

visits.text: Morning at Lake Forggensee to admire the Bavarian Alps

activities.text: End of route and return north or extension to the Black Forest

itineraries.title: FAIRY TALE GERMANY: CASTLES, MEDIEVAL VILLAGES AND ALPINE PANORAMAS

visits.text: Walk along the Moselle quays in Cochem and views of half-timbered houses.
Walk up to Reichsburg Cochem and panorama over the wine valley.
Historic center: Marktplatz and Saint-Martin church.
Sesselbahn cable car to the Pinnerkreuz viewpoint.

activities.text: 1-hour panoramic cruise on the Moselle (loop departing from Cochem).
Photo walk on Cochem bridge for the aligned view of town + castle.

visits.text: Burg Eltz: forest trail from Wierschem parking lot to the castle and inner courtyard.
Würzburg: Alte Mainbrücke (old bridge) with statues and view of the fortress.
Würzburg: Marienberg Fortress (ramparts, gardens, panorama over the Main).
Würzburg: Würzburg Residence (UNESCO) and Hofkirche (exteriors and main halls).
Final journey to Rothenburg ob der Tauber and first orientation walk within the walls.

activities.text: Würzburg tourist train (40 min) to overview the main sites of the historic center.
Photo stops in the vineyards around Würzburg according to designated viewpoints.

visits.text: Rothenburg: complete tour of the ramparts (Stadtmauer) and medieval gates.
Burggarten: views over the Tauber and rooftops, ideal at sunset.
Marktplatz: Rathaus, Ratstrinkstube and animated clock (Glockenspiel).
Plönlein and Siebersturm: iconic medieval perspective.
City History Museum (Zur Stadtgeschichte) and keep under the town hall.

activities.text: Photo walk through the alleyways (early morning to avoid crowds).
Climb up the Rathaus tower for panorama over the old town.

visits.text: Dinkelsbühl: intra-muros loop (gates, towers, promenade around the moats).
Dinkelsbühl: Münster Sankt Georg (Gothic nave and tower).
Hohenzollern Castle: ramparts, courtyards and views over the Swabian Jura (afternoon).

activities.text: Walking route to the ponds and the old debtors' prison in Dinkelsbühl.
Twilight viewpoint over Hohenzollern from the signposted viewpoints at the castle parking.

visits.text: Lichtenstein Castle: courtyard and bridge, interior visit (morning, low crowds).
Arrival in Hohenschwangau: visit to Hohenschwangau Castle.
Museum of the Bavarian Kings (Museum der Bayerischen Könige) on the shores of Alpsee.
Walk along the shores of Alpsee: beaches and views of the mountain ranges.

activities.text: Warm-up walk in late afternoon towards the first viewpoints of Neuschwanstein (reconnaissance).

visits.text: Neuschwanstein: morning ascent via Pöllat gorge to Marienbrücke (main viewpoint).
Interior visit of Neuschwanstein (late morning slot).
Journey to Munich and settling in then first discovery of the historic center.

activities.text: Loop of descents by trails above Marienbrücke for additional secure viewpoints.
Urban walk in Munich: Isartor → Viktualienmarkt → Marienplatz.

visits.text: Munich Residenz: Residence (main halls) + Antiquarium (Renaissance gallery).
Treasury of the Residence (schatzkammer).
Cuvilliés Theatre (visit).
Marienplatz: Glockenspiel (times 11:00/12:00/17:00) and Neues Rathaus (elevator to the belfry).
Frauenkirche (Notre-Dame Cathedral): nave and belvedere (if open).
Englischer Garten (southern section): meadows, Eisbachwelle (surfers).

activities.text: Free walking tour in the old town (Odeonsplatz, Feldherrnhalle, Theatinerkirche).
Museum option: Deutsches Museum (iconic sections of your choice).

visits.text: Free morning in Munich for additional activities (Maxvorstadt district or banks of the Isar).

itineraries.title: CASTLES, FORESTS AND LAKES: A FAIRY-TALE ROAD TRIP IN SOUTHERN GERMANY

visits.text: Discovery of the Römerberg and half-timbered houses of Frankfurt's historic center
Panoramic view of the skyline from the Eiserner Steg bridge
Visit to the Städel Museum and the Goethe-Haus

activities.text: Apfelwein tasting in the Sachsenhausen district

visits.text: Visit to the Würzburg Residence, UNESCO World Heritage site
Climb to Marienberg fortress for the view over the city
Stroll on the Old Main Bridge and local wine tasting

activities.text: Walk through the vineyards around Würzburg

visits.text: Discovery of the Blautopf in Blaubeuren, famous blue spring
Visit to Blaubeuren abbey and the monks' Bathhouse
Exploration of Hohle Fels cave, prehistoric site

activities.text: Scenic route via Ulm before arriving in Munich

visits.text: Stroll at Marienplatz and carillon show at the new town hall
Visit to Nymphenburg Palace and its gardens
Discovery of the English Garden and the Chinese tower

activities.text: Traditional dinner at Hofbräuhaus and tasting of Bavarian dishes

visits.text: Visit to Neuschwanstein Castle and Marienbrücke bridge
Discovery of Hohenschwangau Castle and walk around Lake Alpsee

activities.text: Stroll through the village of Füssen and visit to Saint Mang monastery

visits.text: Journey to Lake Constance and discovery of Lindau
Visit to the prehistoric pile dwellings of Uhldingen-Mühlhofen, UNESCO World Heritage site

activities.text: Walk on the Friedrichshafen promenade at sunset

visits.text: Discovery of the Triberg waterfalls, the highest in Germany
Visit of the Black Forest Museum and the world's largest cuckoo clock

activities.text: Hiking on the panoramic trail around Triberg

visits.text: Return to Frankfurt via the forest roads of Baden-Württemberg
Last stroll along the banks of the Main and discovery of the city center shops

activities.text: Free evening in Frankfurt before the return flight

itineraries.title: LAKES, CASTLES AND BEACHES: ROAD TRIP IN NORTHERN GERMANY

visits.text: Discovery of Berlin's historic center, including the Brandenburg Gate and the Holocaust Memorial.
Bike ride in Tiergarten park and on the former Tempelhof airport.
Visit of the East Side Gallery and exploration of the Friedrichshain district.

activities.text: Stroll in the trendy Neukölln district and tasting of Middle Eastern specialties.
Discovery of the Sunday flea markets at Mauerpark and Arkonaplatz.

visits.text: Stop at Sachsenhausen-Oranienburg for the visit of the memorial concentration camp.
Walk along Lake Ruppiner See and discovery of the historic center of Neuruppin.
Visit of the Sankt Trinitatis church and the adjoining monastery, dating from the 13th century.

activities.text: Relaxation in the thermal baths of Neuruppin, with a view of the lake.

visits.text: Discovery of the historic center of Plau am See and its half-timbered houses.
Visit of the ruins of Plau castle and Saint-Marien church.
Observation of the bascule bridge and the historic water wheel dating from 1273.

activities.text: Walk along Lake Plau and observation of the surrounding canals.

visits.text: Visit of Schwerin castle, a fairy-tale palace located on an island in the middle of the lake.
Discovery of the historic city center and the Gothic brick cathedral of Schwerin.

activities.text: Walk along the shores of Lake Schwerin and exploration of the parliamentary district.

visits.text: Stop in Wismar to discover the medieval old town classified by UNESCO.
Discovery of Kühlungsborn and its 4 km promenade along the Baltic Sea.

activities.text: Relaxation on the beach in a Strandkorb, typical seat of German seaside resorts.
Bike ride in the Kühlung forest and visit to the Buk lighthouse (1878).

visits.text: Visit of the historic center of Rostock and its Gothic churches.
Discovery of the old port and the restored gabled houses.

activities.text: Walk in the Warnemünde district, stroll along the Alter Strom canal and climb up to the 1898 lighthouse.

visits.text: Return stage to Berlin, with possibility to stop in Waren on Lake Müritz for a walk on the shores.
Discovery of Neustrelitz and its baroque gardens.

activities.text: Last evening in Berlin for a nighttime stroll around Alexanderplatz.

itineraries.title: THE ULTIMATE ROAD TRIP IN SOUTHERN GERMANY: CASTLES, FORESTS AND MEDIEVAL TOWNS

visits.text: Discovery of the medieval center of Rothenburg ob der Tauber, its cobblestone streets and half-timbered houses.
Visit to Plönlein, the most photographed street in the city.
Walk on the fortified ramparts and observation of medieval towers and gates.
Discovery of the Marktplatz and the Renaissance town hall.
Stroll in the Burggarten to admire the view of the old town at sunset.

activities.text: Free route on the Romantic Road and photographic exploration of viewpoints.

visits.text: Hiking in the Bavarian Forest National Park (Bayerischer Wald).
Exploration of the Tierfreigelände in Neuschönau, searching for wild animals like lynx or European bison.
Walk to Rachelsee through beech and spruce forests.

activities.text: Animal observation and photography in nature reserves.

visits.text: Discovery of the alpine village of Garmisch-Partenkirchen and its painted facades.
Hike to Partnachklamm gorge and observation of its turquoise blue glacial waters.
Exploration of the Zugspitze massif by cable car or hike to the summit.
Visit to Neuschwanstein Castle (nearby, 40-minute drive).

activities.text: Photography of alpine landscapes and glacial gorges.

visits.text: Scenic route through the Black Forest toward Triberg.
Visit to Triberg Falls, the highest in Germany.
Discovery of the Black Forest museum and the history of the region.
Walk to the giant cuckoo clocks, artisanal emblems of the Schwarzwald.

activities.text: Forest walk and exploration of trails around the waterfalls.

visits.text: Drive on the Schwarzwaldhochstrasse (B500), panoramic route of northern Black Forest.
Stop at Geroldsau waterfall and walk in the surrounding valley.
Visit of the historic center of Baden-Baden, renowned spa town since Roman times.
Discovery of the Caracalla Baths and their marble architecture.

activities.text: Relaxing bath in the natural thermal waters of Baden-Baden.

visits.text: Discovery of the Porta Nigra, Roman gate classified as world heritage.
Visit of the cathedral of Trier and the basilica of Constantine.
Walk in the old town and along the banks of the Moselle.
Discovery of the Roman amphitheater and the imperial baths.

activities.text: Guided urban walk on the theme of the ancient and Christian heritage of Trier.

itineraries.title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL GETAWAYS 2 HOURS FROM HANOVER

visits.text: Celle – stroll in the half-timbered old town and along the Aller
French Garden – tree-lined avenue and classical flower beds
Celle Castle (Schloss Celle) – inner courtyard and Renaissance facades
Stadtkirche St. Marien – climb to the bell tower according to schedule
Former half-timbered synagogue (Im Kreise 24) – exterior and local memory

activities.text: Walking loop along the Aller riverbank and historic bridges

visits.text: Hildesheim – Saint Michael's Church (UNESCO) and painted ceiling
Saint Mary's Cathedral (Dom) – cloister and millennium rose garden
Marktplatz – reconstructed gabled houses

activities.text: Urban route between Michaelisplatz and Domhof

visits.text: Wolfsburg – Autostadt (interactive automotive tours)
Kunstmuseum Wolfsburg – modern and contemporary art
Canal district and Stadtbrücke – urban panorama

activities.text: External discovery of Volkswagen headquarters and delivery towers (overview)

visits.text: Alfeld (Leine) – Fagus-Werk (UNESCO) by Walter Gropius
Historic center – gabled houses and romantic streets
Walk along the banks of the Leine

activities.text: Industrial architecture tour (exterior) around the Fagus-Werk

visits.text: Quedlinburg – medieval city (UNESCO) and cobblestone streets
Quedlinburg Castle and collegiate church – panorama over the city
Schloßmuseum Quedlinburg – historical collections

activities.text: Rooftop viewpoint from the Schlossberg

visits.text: Hamburg – HafenCity and harbor promenades
Elbphilharmonie – exterior discovery and public platforms
Hamburger Kunsthalle – old masters and modern art
St. Michaelis Church – tower and city view (according to schedule)

activities.text: Stroll on the Elbe quays (Landungsbrücken)

visits.text: Bremen – Marktplatz and Schnoor district
St. Peter's Cathedral (St. Petri Dom) – nave and crypt
Kunsthalle Bremen – "Culture Mile"
Walk along the banks of the Weser

activities.text: Urban circuit between Am Wall and the old town

visits.text: Göttingen – historic university and Aula am Wilhelmsplatz
University botanical garden – greenhouses and collections
Old town – Gänseliesel and shopping streets

activities.text: Walking loop city center and green ramparts

visits.text: Berlin – Reichstag (exterior and dome by reservation)
Brandenburg Gate and Pariser Platz
Museumsinsel (UNESCO) – museums and Spree island (choice according to interest)
Fernsehturm and Alexanderplatz – urban panorama

activities.text: Historical walking tour between Reichstag, Unter den Linden and Museum Island

itineraries.title: FROM NUREMBERG TO THE BALTIC SEA: CULTURE AND NATURE OF NORTHERN GERMANY

visits.text: Discovery of Dresden's historic center with the Frauenkirche, the Hofkirche and the Semper Opera House
Exploration of the Gemäldegalerie Alte Meister and the Zwinger, baroque masterpiece of the city

activities.text: Walking or electric scooter ride along the Elbe to admire Dresden's reconstructed skyline

visits.text: Visit to the Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate and Holocaust Memorial
Discovery of the Pergamon Museum and Museum Island, a UNESCO World Heritage site

activities.text: Walk in Tiergarten park and along the Spree to enjoy the summer Berlin atmosphere

visits.text: Hiking in Jasmund National Park, famous for its chalk cliffs overlooking the Baltic Sea
Exploration of the beech forest and panoramic views from Königsstuhl cliff

activities.text: Walk in the fishing port of Sassnitz and observation of traditional Baltic boats

visits.text: Discovery of Hamburg's historic center and city hall
Walk around the Alster and exploration of the Speicherstadt district, a UNESCO site

activities.text: Walk along the quays of Hamburg port and observation of barges on the Elbe

visits.text: Visit to Bremen's center, the market square and Saint Peter's Cathedral
Discovery of the historic Schnoor Viertel district and its medieval alleyways

activities.text: Excursion to the Wadden Sea, UNESCO World Heritage site, for a walk on the mudflats at low tide

visits.text: Discovery of Düsseldorf's historic center and its lively alleyways of the Altstadt
Visit to the modern MedienHafen district and its contemporary architecture

activities.text: Stroll along the Rhine promenade and through the Hofgarten gardens

visits.text: Discovery of the medieval village of Monschau, famous for its half-timbered houses and cobblestone streets

activities.text: Hiking in the Eifel nature park around Monschau

visits.text: Romerberg and historic center of Frankfurt
Frankfurt Cathedral (Kaiserdom Saint-Bartholomaus)
Museum quarter Museumsufer along the Main
Staedel Museum, large collection of European art

activities.text: Walk in the modern financial district and panorama of the Frankfurt skyline

Participation in the Museumsuferfest festival along the Main
Traditional fair Dippemess in Frankfurt
Festival day Waeldchestag in the urban forest Frankfurter Stadtwald

Forest landscapes and trails of Taunus Nature Park
Historic center of Bad Homburg vor der Hoehe
Roman limes sites in the surroundings of the Taunus

activities.text: Relaxation in the thermal facilities of Bad Homburg
Visit to the open air museum Hessenpark dedicated to traditional architecture
Visit to the reconstructed Roman fort of Saalburg

visits.text: Kurhaus of Wiesbaden and surrounding park
Hessisches Staatstheater of Wiesbaden
Neroberg hill and Russian church Saint Elisabeth
Museum Wiesbaden, art and natural sciences collections
Rheingau vineyards around Ruedesheim am Rhein
Viewpoints over the Upper Middle Rhine valley, World Heritage site

activities.text: Wine tasting of Rheingau wines, Riesling and Spätburgunder
Participation in the Rheingau Wine Festival in Wiesbaden

visits.text: Art Nouveau district of Mathildenhöhe
Hochzeitsturm, wedding tower of Darmstadt
Russian Chapel of Darmstadt
Hessisches Landesmuseum Darmstadt
Fossil site of Messel, Messel Pit World Heritage Site

activities.text: Interpretive trail on mammal evolution at Messel
Discovery of the scientific city and research institutes of Darmstadt
Exterior view of the ESOC space control center

visits.text: Lorsch Abbey and King's Hall Koenigshalle

activities.text: Walk in the center of Lorsch around the monastic site

visits.text: Town of Schotten, gateway to Vogelsberg Nature Park
Vogelsberg Nature Park and volcanic landscapes
Hoherodskopf summit with viewpoints
Schotten information center dedicated to the geology and ecology of the park

Cycling or e-bike route in the Vogelsberg

Park center in Voehl Herzhausen
Shores of Lake Edersee

activities.text: Hiking in the beech forests listed as world heritage

Monument of Hercules overlooking the Bergpark
Downtown Kassel and documenta exhibition venues
Grimmwelt Museum dedicated to the Brothers Grimm

activities.text: Tour around the works of documenta, contemporary art exhibition
BergparkLeuchten evening, light and water show in the Bergpark

visits.text: Ruins of Bad Hersfeld Abbey
Historic center of Bad Hersfeld
Free time in Frankfurt for museums, shopping or strolling

activities.text: Final walk along the Main or another visit to a museum on the Museumsufer

Museum at Wartburg Castle with famous paintings by Lucas Cranach from the Renaissance

activities.text: View over the green expanses of the Thuringian Forest from Wartburg Castle

44-meter-high observation platform at Thiemsburg Castle

Root cave
Japanese Garden with koi

Arboretum
Botanical Garden

Fish Market
City Hall
Krämer Bridge

activities.text: Visit the Jewish treasure of Erfurt in the synagogue cellar with Gothic goldsmith's and silversmith's art

visits.text: Tiefurt Castle, former summer residence of Duchess Anna Amalia with colorfully decorated wallpaper, noble furniture and Anna Amalia's lyra guitar

activities.text: Stroll through English landscape park at Tiefurt Castle with meadows, Ilm River, shady trees, monuments and temple to the muses

Goethe's home, part of UNESCO's Classical Weimar World Heritage Site

activities.text: Bauhaus walk with guides about the Bauhaus and university history

visits.text: Schiller Garden House open for tours

Zeiss Planetarium, one of the first large planetariums in the world, in operation since 1926

activities.text: View over the landscape of Thuringia from Leuchtenburg
74.4-kilometer Hohenwarte Reservoir Trail through dense forest and along steep slopes to rocky lookout points on the Saale River
Hiking in Thuringian Slate Mountains/Ober Saale Nature Park, the Sea of Thuringia with fjord-like landscape

Oldest healing gallery in Germany at the Fairy Grottoes with pure air
Grottoneum museum at the Fairy Grottoes

activities.text: Forest adventure trail at Saalfeld Fairy Grottoes

Theater of lovers at Kochberg Castle performing Baroque, Classical and Romantic works

Dresden Castle
Dresden Cathedral

activities.text: Viewing platform at Frauenkirche for city views

Cathedral of St Peter with physical divide between Catholics and Protestants

activities.text: Walk along the mirror-like river admiring castle turrets

Town Hall
